de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.view.message
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.view.message.Message

public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object

Message class is used to create different kind of messages used in the user interface (UI). Access is allowed from every package to generate messages in a fast way.

Since:
Apr/06/09
Version:
0.1
Author:
Michael Munz

Method Detail

showMessageDialog

public static void showMessageDialog(java.lang.String text,
                                     java.lang.String headline,
                                     int messageType)
creates a message dialog. The parameters are in various ways adaptable.

Parameters:
text - text shown in the message pane.
headline - text in the headline of the message pane.
messageType - defines the type of message to show, e.g.:
  • JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE
  • JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE
  • JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE
  • JOptionPane.PLAIN_MESSAGE
  • JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE

showOptionDialog

public static int showOptionDialog(java.lang.String message,
                                   java.lang.String title,
                                   int optionType,
                                   int messageType,
                                   java.lang.Object[] options,
                                   java.lang.Object[] initialValue)
creates and shows an option dialog. The dialog is customizable with a variety of parameters. The call is then passed to JOptionPane

Parameters:
message - as the parameters says: it's the message to display
title - the headline of the dialog frame
optionType - defines the type of option
messageType - specifies the type of message
options - it's also possible to customize the supported options.
initialValue - and last, the initial values can be pre-defined by the system.

showConfirmDialog

public static int showConfirmDialog(java.lang.String text,
                                    java.lang.String headline,
                                    int messageType)
creates a confirmation dialog. The parameters are adaptable in various ways.

Parameters:
text - the text to show in the message pane.
headline - text in the headline of the message pane.
messageType - defines the type of confirmation dialog to show. Possible types are:
  • JOptionPane.DEFAULT_OPTION
  • JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION
  • JOptionPane.YES_NO_CANCEL_OPTION
  • JOptionPane.OK_CANCEL_OPTION
Returns:
an integer, representing the created confirmation dialog.
